Potential 1.title: Super Salty Comeback
Potential 1.description: Battle skill Unconventional Lure improved: SP Recovery grants an additional 10 SP.

Potential 3.title: May the Willing Bite
Potential 3.description: Combo skill Auger Angling improved: After catching a Rare Fin, the entire team gains ATK +15% for 10s. This effect cannot stack.

Potential 4.title: Insane Angling Set
Potential 4.description: Ultimate One Monster Catch! improved: Ultimate Energy cost -15%.

Potential 5.title: Mega Lunker Rumors
Potential 5.description: Ultimate One Monster Catch! improved: Hitting a target below 50% HP increases the DMG Multiplier to 1.5 times the original.
